main.name: Sarah G Evans
main.bio: I'm a self-motivated web developer with a passion for deep knowledge. In addition to experience in Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, React, and Redux, I have over a decade of background in functional MUMPS-based programming, management, and software testing. I have a proven ability to master new technologies and solve difficult problems, and once learned an unfamiliar coding language with only a binder of handwritten notes as a teaching tool. In my free time, I'm co-writing an urban fantasy series and attending as many tech industry meetups as possible.

work.title: Technical Services Support Programmer
work.description: Provided advanced-level technical support for cloud-based and enterprise healthcare applications. Troubleshot and resolved mission-critical issues with code, applications, and servers. Ensured that 100% of personal client roster met attestation deadlines for Meaningful Use software. Participated in design, development, testing, and support for multiple applications.

work.title: Supervisor, InSync Financial Service Programmers
work.description: + Managed and mentored a small team of support and development programmers. Prioritized development tasks with an emphasis on meeting all product and client deadlines. Oversaw group code review process to ensure consistent quality of releases. Developed custom software solutions and resolved escalated client issues.

work.title: Senior Developer and Support Programmer
work.description: Resolved advanced technical issues for internal and external customers. Developed in-house tools to improve customer support process. Onboarded and mentored new team members. Coded application changes, bugfixes and custom solutions for clients.

projects.title: Equidestined
projects.description: The best way to find new places to meet your friends in the middle.

projects.title: Pixel Playground
projects.description: A collaborative art experience, inspired by Redditâ€™s Rplace.
projects.tags: JavaScript, Rails, PostgreSQL, HTML5 Canvas, WebSockets

projects.title: Resume Viewer
projects.description: Upload your resume and contact details from a JSON file to create your own portfolio site.

recommendations.text: Sarah is an excellent problem solver, an incredibly hard worker, and an exceptional communicator. When we worked together at Patient Care Technologies, she quickly grew into an expert programmer, and was a great resource for both the application analysts as well as the other programmers. I would recommend Sarah for any position in support, development, or management. She has a great attitude and an even better work ethic.

Sarah is a hardworking professional with the ability to move projects forward even under the most challenging of circumstances. As a teammate at Iatric Systems, she was a key performer and related and communicated effectively with our clients as well as with C-level, technical, and end-user teammates alike. I sincerely recommend Sarah for any position throughout the product life cycle, as I have no doubt she will excel in the development, implementation, and support arenas.

Sarah joined our team to install and update a complicated product. She was eager to learn and I saw her tackle work others did not want to work on. She gets the job done and values the customers needs and timelines. I highly recommend her and she will get the job done right and on time.
